content: {"name": "Cornerstones, Inc.", "alternate_name": "", "description": "* Clients need to bring picture ID and a piece of mail dated within the last 30 days.\n\n* Serves residents of  20170,20171, 20190, 20191 and 20194 and by referral other zip codes in Fairfax and Loudoun County.", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "11484 Washington Plaza West", "address_2": null, "city": "Reston", "state_province": "VA", "postal_code": "20190", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 38.9685222, "longitude": -77.3425824}, "phones": [{"number": "(571) 323-1410", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "20:30"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "12:30", "closes_at": "17:30"}, {"weekday": "Saturday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:45"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Closed on major holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Photo ID and proof of address is required for adults 18+"}]}
